TopicTitle: wot i thenk shuld bee intje gam.

Articles.Content:
Whin i dounloded the gam, i was not hapie weth it. heer is wut i thenk ther shuld be in the gam.

i want too play with my frends and dok wit them, and may be fite them with guns an stuf.

i think it wuld be cool to chang the surfas of kerbal an dewna to make it bettr and habbitibal.

also the plants look to small and too close the planets shuld be biggr.

the gam dont hav many parts , ther shuld be mor .

i also want to be able to put mechjed into the regerlar gam. its two hard to flie.

but i think the gam engen is not gud enuff. it shuld be on cryengen or source or somthen.

i also wuldn liek to has to met aleeins an they can sugest new parts and fite us if we dont have guns or somthen.

i also nthink that wen my kermins di they shuld get a cemetery.

thank u for reedig my sugestyuns and i hop e u implimint the.

[/joke]
